channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ ByteDance on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Seedream 2.0: A Native Chinese-English Bilingual Image Generation Foundation Model
item.description: Seedream 2.0: A native Chinese-English bilingual image generation model that understands cultural nuances and excels in text rendering.

item.title: MAGA: MAssive Genre-Audience Reformulation to Pretraining Corpus Expansion
item.description: MAGA reformulates existing corpora to massively expand LLM pretraining data, boosting performance across various model sizes while maintaining quality.

item.title: OmniHuman-1: Rethinking the Scaling-Up of One-Stage Conditioned Human Animation Models
item.description: OmniHuman-1: Scaling up one-stage conditioned human animation through novel mixed-condition training.

item.title: EchoVideo: Identity-Preserving Human Video Generation by Multimodal Feature Fusion
item.description: EchoVideo generates high-fidelity, identity-preserving videos by cleverly fusing text and image features, overcoming limitations of prior methods.

item.title: Video Depth Anything: Consistent Depth Estimation for Super-Long Videos
item.description: Video Depth Anything achieves consistent depth estimation for super-long videos by enhancing Depth Anything V2 with a spatial-temporal head and a novel temporal consistency loss, setting a new state-o…

item.title: ToolHop: A Query-Driven Benchmark for Evaluating Large Language Models in Multi-Hop Tool Use
item.description: ToolHop: New benchmark dataset rigorously evaluates LLMs’ multi-hop tool use, revealing significant challenges and variations across different LLM families.

item.title: AnyDressing: Customizable Multi-Garment Virtual Dressing via Latent Diffusion Models
item.description: AnyDressing: Customizable multi-garment virtual dressing via a novel latent diffusion model!

item.title: Infinity: Scaling Bitwise AutoRegressive Modeling for High-Resolution Image Synthesis
item.description: Infinity, a novel bitwise autoregressive model, sets new records in high-resolution image synthesis, outperforming top diffusion models in speed and quality.

item.title: TokenFlow: Unified Image Tokenizer for Multimodal Understanding and Generation
item.description: TokenFlow: One image tokenizer, mastering both visual understanding & generation!

item.title: Ultra-Sparse Memory Network
item.description: UltraMem, a novel ultra-sparse memory network, drastically speeds up LLM inference by 6x compared to MoE while maintaining performance, paving the way for efficient large-scale model deployment.

item.title: Randomized Autoregressive Visual Generation
item.description: Randomized Autoregressive Modeling (RAR) sets a new state-of-the-art in image generation by cleverly introducing randomness during training to improve the model’s ability to learn from bidirectional c…
